column5: Hello, I used to be a very active member of the old OFC site until my wife and I had our first child    , which pretty much put an end to my fishing days    ......until now!  I'm glad to see that the board is still as alive and informative as ever.  I definitely missed reading all the posts and reports, so I'm glad to say that I'm back in the mix.  I start my fishing days again next week with a week long cottage trip booked.  Stay tuned for my first report (at least on the new site that is!).....   Oh....and I had a beautiful baby boy......can't wait to post his first fish ever caught (probably in at least 3 or 4 years!)
Welcome, and congrat's on the new arrival  .
Welcome back and congrats on the new member of the human race.
Good stuff Phishy!!   Welcome back and looking forward to your report..
PHISHY ???????????????????? Oh yea,I remember you.LOL Congrats and look forward to yer reports. I dont have to tell ya,yer WAYYYYYYYYYYY BEHIND!!!!!!!!
Thanks everyone!  I'm so excited to be back!!!  Already went out today at lunch and picked up some new crankbaits for next week!
